law.catch_line: Regular precinct officers to serve as local option precinct officers -- Precinct election officers to be appointed under KRS 117.045 in years without scheduled elections or when local option election held before March 20.
law.text: The precinct election officers appointed for a primary and a regular election under KRS 117.045 shall serve as precinct election officers in local option elections. If a local option election is ordered to be held in a year in which there are no elections scheduled or prior to March 20 in a year in which elections are scheduled, precinct election officers shall be appointed in the manner provided under KRS 117.045 for special elections ordered to be held in a year in which there are no elections scheduled.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 9, effective June 25, 2013. -- Amended 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 90, effective July 13, 1990. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 2554c-11.
